field.name: reqType
field.definition: Type of computer requirements that are necessary to access, interact or operate a component of the resource. The technical information should refer to digital, not non-digital information.

value.definition: The Microsoft Internet Explorer browser is specifically required to make the resource work properly
The Netscape browser is specifically required to make the resource work properly
The resource needs only a browser to work and no other requirements
The Macintosh operating system is needed to make the resource function
Microsoft Windows is needed to make the resource function
The DOS operating system is specifically required to make the resource function
The Unix operating system is needed to make the resource function
In order for the resource to work properly, a tool that is not part of the technical requirements list is needed
A type of viewer from Adobe that is needed to access .pdf (portable document format) files within a resource

Software that is needed to interact fully with geographic data (at an industry standard level) within a resource, including visualizations, queries, analysis, integration capabilities and the ability to create and edit geographic data

Software that is needed to interact fully with geographic data within a resource, including visualizations, queries, analysis, integration capabilities and the ability to create and edit geographic data
A type of viewer called Cosmo Player that is needed to access different types of media files within a resource
A type of spreadsheet program that is needed to access .xls files within a resource
A type of viewer called Flash Player that is needed to access different types of media files within a resource
Java software is needed to interact fully with a resource
A public domain image processing and analysis program from the National Institute of Health that is needed to interact fully with a resource
Software that is required to make a system act like another system, such as making a PC act like a Mac or a Mac act like a PC
A type of viewer called QuickTime that is needed to access .mov (movie) or .mpg (moving picture experts group) files within a resource
A type of viewer called RealPlayer or RealOne that is needed to access different types of media files within a resource
A type of viewer called Shockwave that is needed to access image or movies, often animated .gif (graphics interchange format) files, within a resource

value.vocab: DLESE:Software or plug-in:Scalable Vector Graphics (SVG) viewer
value.definition: A type of viewer called SVG, that stands for Scalable Vector Graphics and that has been popularized by Adobe, that is needed to render still or animaged images created in SVG format.
